name: Categories Links
description: Allows you to place menu categories links on any page.
author: SamPoyigi

tags.1.0.0: Initial tag of categories links extension
tags.1.0.1: Fixed issue where unrecognised character stops category collapse on mobile
tags.1.0.2: Fixed issue with storefront menu list and sidebar modules widths
tags.1.0.3: Fixed menu category permalinks and reverse routing
tags.1.2.0: Update code to use latest Extension API
